definitions.text: in a secure manner; in a manner free from danger
in a confident and unselfconscious manner
examples: he acts very securely in front of the camera

definitions.text: in a manner free from fear or risk
examples: the outcome of expansion in the sixties and seventies will be an academic hierarchy securely supported by scholastic selection
the agreed line was to involve at several points the withdrawal of French troops from positions which they had quite securely held
